positive_examples: This is an example of opening window.
The opening window demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed opening window in this context.
A typical case of opening window would involve these features.
The concept of opening window applies here.
The mechanical motion of moving a window from a closed to an open position.
negative_examples: This is an example of opening eyes, not opening window.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: OpeningEyes, or other types of Opening

definition: The action of moving a window sash to allow air passage or access.
